text: Egh nɨ puram akar dɨkɨrɨzim damighɨva, an gɨn mangan kogh, nɨ arazir kuram gami. Egh nɨ akar dɨkɨrɨzir tam damigh, egh gɨn Godɨn ofa gamir gumazim mɨkɨman markɨ suam, “Kɨ deragha nɨghnɨzir puvatɨgha, akar dɨkɨrɨzir kam gami.” Nɨ tizim bagh God damightɨ an anɨngagharim nɨn ikiam? Nɨ kamaghɨn damutɨ, a nɨn anɨngaghegham. Egh nɨ ingangarir mɨtɨabagh amua inizir bizibagh asɨghasigham.
